channel.title: Comments on: The Prestige
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: The Prestige wasn't as magical, but I thought it was more clever than the Illusionist. Early on in the Illusionist, it was clear there was going to be a happy twist ending. I had no idea what was going to happen in The Prestige.
item.content:encoded: The Prestige wasn’t as magical, but I thought it was more clever than the Illusionist. Early on in the Illusionist, it was clear there was going to be a happy twist ending. I had no idea what was going to happen in The Prestige.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: I have to protest the bumping of The Illusionist. Perhaps it was just that I'd already read the (excellent) book, but I didn't think The Prestige was nearly as good as the Illusionist, or as magical.
item.content:encoded: I have to protest the bumping of The Illusionist. Perhaps it was just that I’d already read the (excellent) book, but I didn’t think The Prestige was nearly as good as the Illusionist, or as magical.

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Daywatch came out in Russia some time ago, so it is available through the usual internet channels.I would imagine it will be released theatrically next year. Dusk Watch comes out in Russia next year as well, but I suspect it won't make it here until 2008.
item.content:encoded: Daywatch came out in Russia some time ago, so it is available through the usual internet channels.I would imagine it will be released theatrically next year. Dusk Watch comes out in Russia next year as well, but I suspect it won’t make it here until 2008.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Ok, so where did you find "Daywatch"? I wasn't aware it was out yet in the US....
item.content:encoded: Ok, so where did you find “Daywatch”? I wasn’t aware it was out yet in the US….

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: Wow, it kicked The Illusionist off the list, huh? I think I might be seeing it tonight...Loved Memento and Batman Begins, and I likes me the magicians, so I think I'll give it a whirl...*hugs*
item.content:encoded: Wow, it kicked The Illusionist off the list, huh? I think I might be seeing it tonight…Loved Memento and Batman Begins, and I likes me the magicians, so I think I’ll give it a whirl…*hugs*
